mapper.sql: a.pkid AS "pkid", a.tendername AS "tendername", a.tendernum AS "tendernum", a.tenderinnernum AS "tenderinnernum", a.prjnum AS "prjnum", a.tenderclassnum AS "tenderclassnum", a.tendertypenum AS "tendertypenum", a.tenderresultdate AS "tenderresultdate", a.tendermoney AS "tendermoney", a.prjsize AS "prjsize", a.area AS "area", a.agencycorpname AS "agencycorpname", a.agencycorpcode AS "agencycorpcode", a.tendercorpname AS "tendercorpname", a.tendercorpcode AS "tendercorpcode", a.constructorname AS "constructorname", a.constructorphone AS "constructorphone", a.idcardtypenum AS "idcardtypenum", a.constructoridcard AS "constructoridcard", a.shypbf AS "shypbf", a.createdate AS "createdate", a.updateflag AS "updateflag", a.sbdqbm AS "sbdqbm", a.datastate AS "datastate", a.cjrqsj AS "cjrqsj", a.xgrqsj AS "xgrqsj", a.scrqsj AS "scrqsj", a.returnresult AS "returnresult", a.updateuser AS "updateuser", c.CodeInfo AS "tenderclassnumlabel", d.CodeInfo AS "tendertypenumlabel"
LEFT JOIN dbo.tbTenderClassDic c ON a.TenderClassNum = c.Code LEFT JOIN dbo.tbTenderTypeDic d ON a.TenderTypeNum = d.Code
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 b.PROJECT_CODE FROM MajorProjectLib.dbo.TBTenderInfo a INNER JOIN MajorProjectLib.dbo.TBProjectInfo b ON a.PrjNum = b.PrjNum WHERE UPPER(a.TenderInnerNum) = UPPER(#{tenderInnerNum})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbtenderinfo( pkid, tendername, tendernum, tenderinnernum, prjnum, tenderclassnum, tendertypenum, tenderresultdate, tendermoney, prjsize, area, agencycorpname, agencycorpcode, tendercorpname, tendercorpcode, constructorname, constructorphone, idcardtypenum, constructoridcard, shypbf, createdate, updateflag, sbdqbm, datastate, cjrqsj, xgrqsj, scrqsj, returnresult, updateuser ) VALUES ( #{pkid}, #{tendername}, #{tendernum}, #{tenderinnernum}, #{prjnum}, #{tenderclassnum}, #{tendertypenum}, #{tenderresultdate}, #{tendermoney}, #{prjsize}, #{area}, #{agencycorpname}, #{agencycorpcode}, #{tendercorpname}, #{tendercorpcode}, #{constructorname}, #{constructorphone}, #{idcardtypenum}, #{constructoridcard}, #{shypbf}, #{createdate}, #{updateflag}, #{sbdqbm}, #{datastate}, #{cjrqsj}, #{xgrqsj}, #{scrqsj}, #{returnresult}, #{updateuser} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbtenderinfo SET pkid = #{pkid}, tendername = #{tendername}, tendernum = #{tendernum}, tenderinnernum = #{tenderinnernum}, prjnum = #{prjnum}, tenderclassnum = #{tenderclassnum}, tendertypenum = #{tendertypenum}, tenderresultdate = #{tenderresultdate}, tendermoney = #{tendermoney}, prjsize = #{prjsize}, area = #{area}, agencycorpname = #{agencycorpname}, agencycorpcode = #{agencycorpcode}, tendercorpname = #{tendercorpname}, tendercorpcode = #{tendercorpcode}, constructorname = #{constructorname}, constructorphone = #{constructorphone}, idcardtypenum = #{idcardtypenum}, constructoridcard = #{constructoridcard}, shypbf = #{shypbf}, createdate = #{createdate}, updateflag = #{updateflag}, sbdqbm = #{sbdqbm}, datastate = #{datastate}, cjrqsj = #{cjrqsj}, xgrqsj = #{xgrqsj}, scrqsj = #{scrqsj}, returnresult = #{returnresult}, updateuser = #{updateuser} WHERE id = #{id}
